fixes.name: Max Date
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR weekDay = WEEKDAY(TODAY(), 1)
RETURN
SWITCH(
    weekDay,
    1, TODAY() - 2,
    2, TODAY() - 3,
    TODAY() - 1
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau CASE using datepart('weekday', TODAY()) with DAX WEEKDAY(TODAY(), 1) and mapped CASE to SWITCH. Subtracted days from TODAY() as in the original. Created as a calculated column because this is a row-level date calculation without aggregations or parameters.
